8.name: Bandit Slayer
8.description: All criminals eventually meet a dark end.

24.name: Shell Slayer
24.description: Even the creatures in the deep aren't safe from harm.

87.name: Chef
87.requirement: Reach rating  in the chef discipline.

89.name: Jeweler
89.requirement: Reach rating  in the jeweler discipline.

94.name: Charr Specialty Armors
94.description: Fine armor for an exemplary soldier.
94.requirement: Soulbind  unique piece of charr cultural armor.

142.name: Shaman's Rookery
142.description: Prove your might to the four Spirits of the Wild.

145.name: Emerald Sanctum
145.description: Unlock the treasures in the Emerald Sanctum.

171.name: Keg Steals
171.description: Catch fumbled kegs on the fly.
171.requirement: Recover  fumbles from the opposing team in keg brawl.

272.name: Hunter
272.description: Two heads are better than one.

432.name: Toypocalypse Cancelled
432.description: This dolyak WILL make it to deliver the presents today.
432.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak.

456.name: Daily Exotic Crafter
456.requirement: Craft  exotic item from any discipline.

474.name: Maguuman Killer
474.description: The jungle is a dangerous place.
474.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

519.name: Monthly Group Event Completer
519.description: Overcome challenging group events through teamwork.

566.name: PvP Monthly Wins
566.description: Victory or death... but mostly victory!

602.name: Consortium Rewards Club Member
602.description: Complete Southsun events while affiliated with the Consortium.

610.name: Consultation with Researcher Levvi
610.description: Speak with Researcher Levvi on Southsun Cove.

615.name: Southsun Sightseer
615.description: Visit all the settlements of Southsun Cove.

673.name: Vexing Cache
673.requirement: Loot the Aetherblade Cache in Vexa's Lab in Fireheart Rise.

715.name: Poor Man's Kite
715.requirement: Find the large kite hidden in Beggar's Burrow in Queensdale.

720.name: Like Clockwork
720.requirement: Transform quartz crystals into charged quartz crystals at a place of power.

780.name: Queen's Gauntlet Climber
780.requirement: Complete all  tiers of the Queen's Gauntlet during the Jubilee.

790.name: Hoelbrak Envoy
790.requirement: Represent Hoelbrak in the Crown Pavilion. Escort norn emissaries to hot-air balloons.

903.name: I Found It!
903.requirement: Find the sunken treasure within the Watery Grave.

908.name: Have a Seat and Pull the Trigger
908.requirement: Use a hylek turret at the Tequatl battle site.

1134.name: Tower of Nightmares Survivor
1134.requirement: Survive  chamber in the Tower of Nightmares.

1233.name: Aftermath Toxic Consumer II
1233.requirement: Use  Toxic Maintenance Oils, Toxic Sharpening Stones, Toxic Tuning Crystals, or Experimental Chiles.

1289.name: Wintersday Skritt Hit V
1289.description: Give those stealers a snowball sandwich.
1289.requirement: Hit  skritt with snowballs anywhere in Tyria.

1293.name: Golden Generosity
1293.requirement: Donate gold to either Ho-Ho-Tron or Marcello DiGiacomo in Lion's Arch.

1299.name: Solo Arena Three Wins
1299.description: You're on a roll; don't stop now!
1299.requirement: Win  Solo Arena Match in PvP

1320.name: Boss Thumper IV
1320.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1507.name: No More Tricks, Scarlet
1507.description: Story Instance: Battle on the Breachmaker
1507.requirement: Defeat Scarlet's Prime Hologram without being hit by lasers or their lingering scorch marks.

1635.name: Quicksand Survivor
1635.requirement: Survive for a minimum of 15 seconds while standing in the quicksand river around Prosperity.

1714.name: Citadel of Flame Collector
1714.requirement: Use tales of dungeon delving from Citadel of Flame to unlock all  weapon and armor skins in your wardrobe.

1720.name: Uncanny Canner
1720.requirement: Collect all  jarred trinkets from vendors around Tyria.

1724.name: The Ruined City of Arah Collector
1724.requirement: Use tales of dungeon delving from the Ruined City Arah to unlock all  weapon and armor skins in your wardrobe.

1799.name: The Demolisher
1799.requirement: Slay the Legendary Mordrem Demolisher. Appears rarely around Indigo Cave when controlled by the Pact.

1900.name: Daily Only Zuhl Jumping Puzzle
1900.requirement: Complete the Only Zuhl jumping puzzle in Timberline Falls.

2054.name: "Point of No Return" Mastery
2054.requirement: Complete all  "Point of No Return" achievements.

2063.name: Golem Protector
2063.requirement: Defend the golem siege carrier during the assault on the Mordrem Vinewrath.

2115.name: Daily Ranger or Thief Winner
2115.requirement: Win  PvP match as a ranger or thief.

2118.name: Daily Engineer or Necromancer Winner
2118.requirement: Win  PvP match as an engineer or necromancer.

2243.name: "Unsolved Conundrum" Strongbox
2243.requirement: Search in the Broken Altar area for the strongbox from the "Unsolved Conundrum."

2248.name: Follows Advice
2248.description: Unlocks additional daily achievements for fractal scales 21–49.
2248.requirement: Complete the Follows Advice tier of the Fractal Attunement Mastery.

2297.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 28
2297.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2313.name: The Minstrel I: The Experimental Focus
2313.description: Which came first, the critic or the egg? It is hard to tell, but the former seems to be well armed with the latter. Comprehend the nature of these critical missiles in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor The Bard.
2313.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Get hit by a Risen Chicken's egg.
Save the chickens trapped in the dust-mite twister in Dry Top.
Get turned into a chicken by the Skritt Burgler.
Complete the Out of Cluck achievement: While inside the Urban Battleground Fractal, kill all of the chickens in the city.
Put a chicken back in its cage in Degun Shun in Blazeridge Steppes.
Throw a karka egg at the Karka Queen in Southsun Cove.
Return a raven egg to a nest in Wayfarer Foothills.
Watch the moa dance! Purchased from Moa Trainer Kappa in Beetletun, Queensdale after escorting her and her pygmy moas.
Purchase this common egg dish from Ainne in the Grove, Bryndora in Hoelbrak, Caeva in the Black Citadel, or Elnor in Lion's Arch.
Purchase the recipe for this egg dish from Pochtecatl, near the Jelako Cliffrise of Bloodtide Coast, after defending him while he gathers griffon eggs.
Purchase the recipe for this egg dish from Drottot Lashtail near the Devourer's Mouth in Plains of Ashford.
Purchase the recipe for this egg dish from Assistant Chef Victor on the Scaver Plateau in Queensdale after collecting skale eggs for him.
Purchase the recipe for this egg dish from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase the recipe for this egg dish from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase the recipe for this egg dish from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.

2324.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Canopy Over Pact Encampment
2324.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2336.name: Nevermore III: The Raven Staff
2336.description: Tyria is both a physical and a spiritual place, and its hills and forests are alive with ghosts, spirits, and other ethereal creatures. Seek the spirit of the wild raven that haunts its hills and forests. Let it lead you on its path in your quest to attain the Raven Staff, the next step in your quest to attain Nevermore.

bits.text: Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven near the treasure chest deep within the Shaman's Rookery in Wayfarer Foothills.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven near the treasure chest deep within the Tears of Itlaocol in Caledon Forest.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven near the splendid chest of Rebel's Seclusion in Fireheart Rise.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven deep within the ruins of Ashford Abbey in Plains of Ashford.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of one of the ravens that appears outside Bria's house in Iron Marches after defeating her.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven within the chamber at the end of the Urban Battlegrounds Fractal.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven at the end of the Cliffside Fractal.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven near the Jade Maw in the Solid Ocean Fractal.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven at Grenth's Door in Lornar's Pass.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven in the Ascalon Settlement cemetery in Gendarran Fields at night.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven in the Valley of Gwaun in Mount Maelstrom.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven that appears in the ruins of the Temple of the Ages after defeating the Shadow Behemoth.

Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven that appears in the Thaumanova Reactor of Metrica Province after defeating the Fire Elemental.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven in Old Holtimm Abbey in Diessa Plateau.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven deep within the Decimus Stones of Plains of Ashford.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven near the Foefire's Heart in Plains of Ashford.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven deep within the cave at Human's Lament in Plains of Ashford.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven at the top of the Remains of the Northern Wall in Diessa Plateau.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven in the Grendich Ruins of Diessa Plateau.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven hidden down in the Old Grendich Aqueduct of Diessa Plateau.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven near the Wreckage of Serenity in Blazeridge Steppes.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven behind the Owl Lodge in Snowden Drifts.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven at the Field of the Fallen memorial in Lion's Arch.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven at Balthazar's Rest in the Auric Basin.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven on the high ledge in the Ley Line Confluence of Tangled Depths.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven within the Masks of the Fallen memorial in Auric Basin.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the ravens at the Blighted Trees in Morwood Wilds in Auric Basin.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven down in the Creeping Crevasse Ruins of Verdant Brink.
Use the Subtle Spyglass with the Spirit Containment Unit in your inventory to see the true nature of the raven at the center of the Labyrinth in the Silverwastes.

After chasing the raven spirit around Tyria and beyond, find it at its final location, the Ravenbeak Shrine in Lornar's Pass, and use the Subtle Spyglass to capture it in your Spirit Containment Unit.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2400.name: Adept Chronomancer
2400.requirement: Begin training the mesmer's chronomancer elite specialization.

2424.name: Tendril Torchers: Silver
2424.requirement: Burn tendrils and avoid unexploded shot before time runs out!

2508.name: Machined Warhorn
2508.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Warhorn.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2625.name: Friend of the Frogs
2625.description: The Nuhoch will warble your legend forever!
2625.requirement: Participate in every stage of building Teku Nuhoch back up.

2665.name: Keep the Lights On
2665.requirement: Light the brazier at the far end of the Spirit Woods without dropping the spectral torch.

2725.name: Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends
2725.requirement: Complete all 11 Path of Ascension III achievements.

2755.name: League Professional—Elite
2755.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.

2831.name: Environmentally Friendly
2831.requirement: Complete the prison camp encounter without using the environment to your advantage.

2835.name: Slippery Slubling
2835.requirement: Ensure that someone in your raid squad is holding the golden slubling so that it may witness the death of Slothasor.

2855.name: Adventuring 201
2855.requirement: Complete World 2, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2857.name: Adventuring 203
2857.requirement: Complete World 2, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2886.name: Locksmithing 101
2886.requirement: Open all the chests in World 1, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2889.name: Daily Tier 2 Underground Facility
2889.requirement: Complete Underground Facility at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2926.name: Daily Tier 3 Cliffside
2926.requirement: Complete Cliffside at fractal scale 51 or higher.

2927.name: Daily Tier 1 Aetherblade
2927.requirement: Complete Aetherblade at fractal scale 1 or higher.

3047.name: Notetaker
3047.requirement: Find all 7 of the lost journal pages in Chaos Isles.

3078.name: Bloodstone Fen Insight: Fragmented Wastes
3078.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Bloodstone Fen.

3079.name: Embellished Weapon Collection
3079.requirement: Unlock all  Embellished weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3128.name: Task Master
3128.description: Who's afraid of a little lava?
3128.requirement: Finish all the tasks around Ember Bay.

bits.text: Win the favor of the circus

3132.name: Daily Ember Bay Magic Gatherer
3132.requirement: Gather unbound magic from the sky in Ember Bay.

3258.name: Wrapping Everywhere
3258.description: Only one way to find out what's inside.

3300.name: Letters from E
3300.requirement: Find the letters scattered around Lake Doric from E.

3403.name: Hot Splashes
3403.description: Just a casual dip in another hollow volcano.
3403.requirement: Acquire diving goggles near the gate of fire, and dive into the bucket floating in the boiling sea.

3520.name: Storyteller: Abaddon
3520.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Abaddon.

bits.text: Tucked away in the spider's den.
Inside the ship that sits on both land and sea.
Face the lava in between the twins.
Climb the porous walls of the steaming waterway.
Attached to the porous walls of the steaming waterway.
Dive deep where Dwayna meets the waterway.
In the rubble of the place that has been forgotten.
Sitting in the shade of overgrown palms.
Hidden among the garden that is secret.
Kept safe by the Priest of Abaddon.

3526.name: Iron Marches Insight: Sunken Halls of Clarent
3526.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Iron Marches.

3580.name: Hallowed Ground
3580.requirement: Earn the respect of ghostly guardians.

3606.name: Undead Bouncer
3606.requirement: Save all of Zalambur's guests from being harmed by Awakened attackers.

3637.name: Joko's Hidden Chamber
3637.description: Joko has sealed away an important part of his kingdom beneath the shattered ravines near the Bone Palace.
3637.requirement: Gain entry to Joko's hidden chamber.

3742.name: Breaking the Bank: Final Vault
3742.requirement: Open the final chest in the mysterious vaults.

3751.name: Fireproof Heart
3751.requirement: Rescue the people of Seeker's Village without taking burning damage.

3782.name: Realm-Portal Spiker
3782.description: The Forged open realm portals at Maws within the Ruptured Heart to get reinforcement squads. The residue from emerging units can be combined with portal spikes to damage the realm portals.
3782.requirement: Plant 100 portal spikes into the realm portals at the Ruptured Heart.

3855.name: Legendary Sandstorm Player
3855.description: Collecting these cards is a popular diversion for citizens of Amnoon. Sandstorm cards are said to also reveal one's fortune, a prospect of dubious appeal in these turbulent times.

3875.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Kanuz Overlook
3875.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3876.name: Master Spellbreaker
3876.requirement: Completely train the warrior's spellbreaker elite specialization.

3904.name: Heart of Gold
3904.description: You'll take any job, no matter how big or small.
3904.requirement: Complete all renown hearts for all major areas in the Crystal Desert region.

bits.text: Complete all renown hearts in Crystal Oasis.
Complete all renown hearts in the Desert Highlands.
Complete all renown hearts in the Elon Riverlands.
Complete all renown hearts in the Desolation.
Complete all renown hearts in the Domain of Vabbi.

3945.name: Shut the Doors
3945.requirement: Complete  door event in the Mad King's Labyrinth.

3961.name: From Downtown!
3961.requirement: Throw a static conduit and destroy a static storm orbiting Scruffy from very far away.

3985.name: Misplaced Loyalty
3985.description: They honestly thought they picked the winning side.
3985.requirement: Kill each of the six loyalist leaders inside the Temple of Joko.

3999.name: Bookworm
3999.description: Or at least read the back cover.
3999.requirement: Put away and read  books in the main library.

bits.text: Everyday Healing: Gift of the Monk

4100.name: Magnetic Attraction
4100.requirement: Collect all eight magneton particles floating in the Magnetics Lab.

4158.name: (Annual) World 1 Classic
4158.description: For when you want to relive the original experience.
4158.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1 without enabling Exploration Mode.

4195.name: "Long Live the Lich" Mastery
4195.requirement: Complete all  "Long Live the Lich" achievements.

4258.name: Valor Beyond Valor
4258.requirement: Receive the Gandaran Service Medal and the Tyrian Service Medal.

bits.text: Awarded the Gandaran Service Medal for exemplary valor.
Awarded the Tyrian Service Medal for indomitable courage.

4356.name: Requiem: Experiment 5
4356.description: <c=@Flavor>It has a certain...what do you call it, Mist-ique?</c>
4356.requirement: Untangle this item from the Mists.

4414.name: Ethereal Exchange
4414.description: I have to stop Kralkatorrik for Nenah and all the others in the Mists who are in danger.

4429.name: Let's Not Do That Again
4429.requirement: Defeat the largos assassins while the challenge mote is active.

4450.name: Rivalry of Kings
4450.description: Have a face-to-face conversation with King Palawa Joko in the episode "Long Live the Lich."
4450.requirement: Report to Brigadier General Kernel on the latest developments in the eternal battle between Mad King Thorn and Palawa Joko.

4468.name: Rolling Rookie: Kessex Corner
4468.requirement: Complete the roller beetle practice course in Kessex Hills within the time limit.

4476.name: Rolling Ace: Jormag's Fang
4476.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Snowden Drifts within the challenge time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4601.name: Hazardous Materials: Silver
4601.requirement: Successfully deliver volatile oil to Audree at Ironhammer Crossing.

4634.name: Warclaw Emblem
4634.description: A detailed emblem featuring the warclaw.
4634.requirement: Acquire a warclaw emblem by spending one World Ability Point in the Warclaw Mastery section of the WvW menu.

4693.name: Raising Skyscales
4693.locked_text: Unlocks a short time after completing the Saving Skyscales collection.

4723.name: Life in the Underworld
4723.requirement:
Complete 10 events for the Olmakhan in the Underworld.
Required to gain access to the Olmakhan quartermaster.

4748.name: Underworld Slayer
4748.requirement: Slay  foes within the Underworld in Dragonfall.

4784.name: Baroness of the Arena
4784.requirement: Finish the season in 26th–100th place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4967.name: Master of Ceremonies
4967.requirement: Complete each type of mini-event at the concert.

4985.name: Immaculate Champ
4985.requirement: Defeat the Ooze Pit's grand champion without being hit by any ooze's explosions. Must be present at the start of the event to qualify.

4988.name: A Race to Arms
4988.description: Journal: A Race to Arms Completed

5101.name: Mystery of the Labyrinth
5101.requirement: Complete Mystery of the Labyrinth  times.

5135.name: Beckon the Ice
5135.description: The Sons of Svanir offer their power to Drakkar. Someone must silence them.
5135.requirement: Earn gold participation in 20 Idol of Jormag events.

5202.name: Mission Challenge: Tank Escort
5202.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with the Tank Escort challenge active.

5264.name: Special Mission: Feel the Pulse
5264.requirement: Strike 5 or more targets with a single Electromagical Pulse from a charr waystation  times.
5264.locked_text: Unlock by using Flame Legion Special Mission Documents.

5292.name: Ambush Hunter
5292.requirement: Defeat oni throughout End of Dragons maps. Oni in Gyala Delve grant more progress.

5393.name: Special Mission: Bullets and Beans
5393.requirement: Escort  allied supply caravans in the Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5430.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-Three
5430.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Three.

5432.name: Daily Bonus Rewards: Boss Blitz
5432.requirement: Complete a Boss Blitz meta-event in the Crown Pavilion.

bits.text: Get more info from Ardra at the skimmer camp in Elon Riverlands.
Check around Amnoon Harbor for leads on Sibaha's whereabouts.
Find the mysterious charr in Desert Highlands.
Find the "famous water djinn" or speak to someone who knows him.
Help defend Moshpoipoi from the icebrood.
Find the "helpful largos" in Whisper Bay.
Help Aaminah deal with the Risen.
Search for Sibaha around krait-infested waters in Mount Maelstrom.
Obtain a cage key from Sibaha's krait captors or from the nearby champion.
Meet Sibaha back in Lion's Arch.
Earn silver placement or better on Sibaha's Advanced Skimmer Course.

5474.name: Paratrooper
5474.description: No, you can't deploy your parachute again once you've cut it. How would that even work?
5474.requirement: Speak to Elizia to learn about airdropping, and then click base icons on the map while in Drizzlewood Coast to airdrop over areas held by the United Legions.

bits.text: Speak to Elizia Skysight in Umbral Grotto.

5523.name: There's Sea Life Down Here?
5523.requirement: Fish in any fishing spot in Gyala Delve.

5565.name: Dragon Fire Infuser
5565.requirement: Unlock all recipes to craft the Crimson Dragon Slayer weapons.

5610.name: League Slayer—3v3 Season Three
5610.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 3v3 Season Three.

5650.name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Caledon Forest
5650.requirement: Complete the Caledon Forest Dragon Response Mission.

5672.name: Choya Fractal Hero
5672.description: Note: This achievement functions on the honor system.
5672.requirement: While under the effects of the Choya Elixir, complete the hardest fractal you can. Then, and only then, report your accomplishments to the choya sage in Lion's Arch.

5822.name: Crop Harvester: Bloodstone Fen
5822.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Bloodstone Fen.

5858.name: Good-bye Again
5858.requirement: Wave to the departing Twisted Marionette.

5888.name: Return to Grothmar Valley
5888.requirement: Complete  Return to Bound by Blood achievements.

5918.name: Renowned Hero: Sandswept Isles
5918.requirement: Complete renown hearts in the Sandswept Isles.

6002.name: Return to Forearmed Is Forewarned
6002.requirement: Complete the story mission Forearmed Is Forewarned in Living World Season 4 Episode 3.

6042.name: Feline of the Labyrinth
6042.requirement: Receive a boon from an old occupant of the Mad King's Labyrinth.

6062.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty
6062.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty.

6069.name: Authorial Intent
6069.requirement: Check in on an old friend in Cantha.

6082.name: Ready Up: South
6082.requirement: Complete a total of  southern meta preparation events.

6097.name: Saboteur in Our Midst
6097.description: How well can you pass for a mad scientist bent on world domination?
6097.requirement: Without being caught or leaving the area, sabotage the Jade Brotherhood Headquarters, taking the renown heart from completely empty to completely full.

6160.name: Ultimate Dragon Champion
6160.requirement: Defeat the enemy dragon champions summoned by Soo-Won.

6231.name: Daigo Ward Raptor Ride
6231.requirement: Ride a raptor from the bell in Daigo Ward to Aurene's cave in under 3 minutes without dismounting or teleporting.

6503.name: Can Never Be Too Careful
6503.requirement: Scan a friend to be sure they are not hiding anything.

6551.name: Undevoured
6551.requirement: Complete the Xunlai Jade Junkyard Strike Mission without taking damage from Devouring Void while challenge mode is active.

6571.name: Tigris Cub Collection
6571.requirement: Unlock all tigris cub minis in your wardrobe.

6614.name: Using Healing Skills
6614.requirement:
Use a healing skill  time.

<c=@reminder>Healing skills are located on the sixth skill slot of every character's skill bar.</c>

6657.name: Applying Dye
6657.requirement:
Dye  piece of equipment.

<c=@reminder>Dye are colors that can be applied to equipped armor, outfits, mounts, and gliders, allowing you to personalize the look of your character. You can access your dyes from the Dye tab in your Hero panel.</c>

6674.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Three
6674.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Three.

6680.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Three
6680.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Three.

6696.name: Guarding the Fields
6696.requirement: Complete events in Gendarran Fields to safeguard settlements in the area.

6716.name: Decade of Adventure: Crystal Desert
6716.requirement: Complete  events in the Crystal Desert region.

6762.name: Tower of Treasures
6762.requirement: Find hidden chests in the Tower of Nightmares.

6790.name: League Conqueror—2v2 Season Eight
6790.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Eight.

6807.name: League Slayer—2v2 Season Eight
6807.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season Eight.

6810.name: Patrolling the Bloodtide Beat 2
6810.requirement: Complete events in Bloodtide Coast to discourage unapproved piracy in the region.

6885.name: Super Adventure Test Krewe
6885.requirement: Offer to help Moto by exploring the World 3 Test Zone.

bits.text: Read the note on the World 3 entrance door inside the Super Adventure Box.
Speak with Moto in Rata Sum.

6888.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty-Seven
6888.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Seven.

6912.name: Special Ops Basic Course 3
6912.requirement: Complete the assigned tasks to acquire the Special Ops Pauldrons Locker.
6912.locked_text: Learn all you can from Captain Wing Jun in Gyala Delve to unlock.

7001.name: Knowing Is Half the Battle
7001.description: Looks like there IS a culinary application for bloodstone dust after all!
7001.requirement: Prepare 5 ingredients in a row for Alchemist Briella during a single event.

7013.name: Guided by Fate
7013.description: The world is not yet safe, and you still have work to do. Where would you like to start?
7013.requirement: Use /kneel at Glint's Shrine in Droknar's Light.

7091.name: Voices beyond the Veil
7091.requirement: Continue working with the Rift Hunters.

7200.name: Eternal Protector of Droknar's Light
7200.description: The light of hope will never dwindle.
7200.requirement: Successfully complete events around Droknar's Light.

bits.text: Protect Forgemaster Elrik while he gathers scrap metal. (Event 1 of 3)
Bring high-quality billet to Forgemaster Elrik while the forge is active. (Event 2 of 3)
Defeat the dwarf before they're fully possessed. (Event 3 of 3)
Stop the angry dwarves from causing a panic.
Search piles of rubble and suspicious trees for Stone Summit. (Event 1 of 2)
Help the Deldrimor defend Droknar's Light. (Event 2 of 2)
Help High Elder Farid defeat his ancient enemy.
Help Battlemaster Flintfoot prepare new trainees for combat. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat the champion engorged ice elemental.

7604.name: WvW Rush Keep Capturer 2
7604.requirement: Capture a keep for your realm in World vs. World.

7619.name: WvW Rush Player vs. Player
7619.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in World vs. World.

7627.name: WvW Rush Tower Capturer 2
7627.requirement: Capture towers for your realm in World versus World.

7663.name: Auric Basin Incursions
7663.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Auric Basin.

7676.name: Oneiros-Spun Armor
7676.description: Pointy hats are out; pointy horns are in.
7676.requirement:
Purchase the Oneiros-Spun Armor set from the Wizard's Tower Outfitter.
Unlocking one skin's weight unlocks the other weights' skins.

7686.name: Relics—Secrets of the Obscure Set 1
7686.requirement: Collect  relics from Secrets of the Obscure Relics Set 1.

7781.name: Astral Ward Arsenal
7781.requirement:
Find all the ancient artifacts in Nyedra Surrounds to learn new weapon proficiencies.
Players can also unlock this achievement by purchasing the artifacts in WvW from the Heroics Notary vendor.

bits.text: Ancient Scroll of Astral Ward Weapons

7785.name: All Ears
7785.requirement: Speak with Arina and Ramses after the climax at the coliseum.

7792.name: Legendary Relic Collector
7792.description: Who needs Archivist Ikur when you have this?

7798.name: (Repeatable) Inner Nayos: Nyedra Surrounds Savior
7798.description: Your allies are eternally grateful for your continuing help.
7798.requirement: Successfully complete events in Nyedra Surrounds in Inner Nayos.

7879.name: Returning to the Heart of Maguuma
7879.requirement: Meet with Grand Warmaster Laranthir in the Silverwastes to learn about the Return to Heart of Thorns event.

7880.name: Legendary Revered
7880.description: Sending my enemies to meet the legends.
7880.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a revenant.

7917.name: Upper Seating
7917.requirement: While under the effects of a Fool's Tall Tonic, sit in chairs in Central Tyria. (Chairs you own do not count.)

7938.name: Catch and Release
7938.requirement: Return a piranha to the deep water in the Test Zone.

7982.name: Underworld Veteran
7982.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

7991.name: Yak's Bend Veteran
7991.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8016.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Umbriel: Silver
8016.requirement: Earn silver-rank timing or better in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8062.name: Tower Bibliophile
8062.requirement: Find hidden texts around the Wizard's Tower.

8084.name: Jade Quarry Veteran
8084.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8162.name: Festering Basin Renown Mastery
8162.requirement: Help the kodan clean up the Festering Basin to gain their favor.

8216.name: Forgiveness
8216.requirement: Witness an exchange of apology and acceptance.

8225.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Pillar of Reaping
8225.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8241.name: Event Collection: Central Janthir Syntri
8241.requirement:
Participate in successful events around Dead Lab, Sanguine Crater, and Blood Hill.

(Some events can count toward multiple achievements.)

bits.text: Help Gosta contact the restless spirits.
Security Activated: Defeat the Champion Jade Construct (Event 2 of 2)

8323.name: Shore Creatures
8323.description: Become the top fisher in Lowland Shore.
8323.requirement: Win a fishing tournament in Lowland Shore.

8342.name: Harvest Shore Salmon Run: Gold
8342.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Harvest Shore Salmon Run.

8427.name: Push Contender
8427.requirement: Complete the final Persimmon chest during a Push miniseason.

8485.name: Raid: Decima, the Stormsinger
8485.description: The amosphere is dense and crackling. The Stormsinger nears...

8625.name: Mistburned Barrens Explorer
8625.description: You've explored the ruins of Mistburned Barrens.
8625.requirement: Explore all areas in Mistburned Barrens.

8648.name: (Annual) Seats of Power
8648.requirement: Sit in chairs in Central Tyria. (Chairs you own do not count.)

8713.name: A Titanic Voyage
8713.requirement: Complete all parts of the A Titanic Voyage meta-event.

bits.text: Power Livia's spell with titanspawn energy.
Bring down the semipermeable membrane protecting the northern organ cavity.
Bring down the semipermeable membrane protecting the central organ cavity.
Bring down the semipermeable membrane protecting the southern organ cavity.

8721.name: Sweet Relief
8721.requirement: Complete all 3 "Use medicine to reduce the titan's inflammation and open the pathway" events.

8794.name: Revenge of Knaebelag
8794.requirement: During the Fangs That Gnash meta-event in Inner Nayos, defeat Knaebelag the Terror.
